About Me

Let me tell you about myself...

BIO

Developed vacation rental website for 6 years.

Over 15 years of experience performing a full range of systems architecture, requirements, design, integration, test, and risk management.

Education

  • B.S. Electrical and Computer Engineering, University of Wisconsin - Madison, 1988
